Text.Page:
I'm curious to see what you've got. Are you like most of the recruits that come through here, or are you something different?

Let's see how far you get with Haidehrâ€”he's our duelist, and perhaps the finest in Velika. Then I'll know what I've got to work with.
Ready to prove your worth, are you? There's no better way than dueling, if you ask me.
